title: Does anyone get this issue
body: We all know when someone is in game you can mouse over their name to see how long they have been in game for, just one issue for a select few people this doesn't show up for me when  I mouse over their name. Does anybody else get this issue or know a fix? is it an option on their side or just a random bug?

replies.body: It's just an occasional bug for me.

Quite annoying, I get it sometimes myself. It's not optional, just a bug in the system. Though, arguably it's better than when it says your friends have been in game for an hour greater than they have when it's around daylight saving time :P.
Yeah, I have particular friends in my friends list that it NEVER shows for. I always thought that there must have been some security option somewhere not to display it.... guess its just a bug.
I thinks it's a random bug. I sometimes get that happening with my friends.
